posts.post_content:
This guy with [Swarmyard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Swarmyard) on the battlefield. Throw in [Throat Slitter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Throat Slitter) for more rat plague. "Oh, you don't want to block my [Typhoid Rats](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Typhoid Rats) token? Well, your creature is dead and I get another one."  
  
Thinking about it, these might be the creatures that the "Dies to Doomblade" crowd runs.
